text: avaru (davudaru) helidaru; ‘‘ninna kuriyannu tanna kurigala rasige serisalu agrahisuva mulaka avanu khandita ninna mele akramavesagiruvanu. Khanditavagiyu, jotegudi badukuvavaralli heccinavaru paraspara an'yayavesaguttare – visvasigalu mattu satkarmigala horatu. Mattu anthavaru tumba kadime‘‘. (I mulaka) navu tam'mannu pariksisidevembudannu davudaru managandaru mattu avaru tam'ma odeyana munde ksameyacisutta, avanige saranagi, bagutta sastangaveragi bittaru
